proc publish_bulk_assign[T, O](self: Ed[T, O]; op_ctx: OperationContext)
Publish the entire tracked value as a single BulkAssign message. Used for efficient bulk updates instead of sending individual Assign messages.

proc subscribe(self: EdContext; address: string; bidirectional = true;

    ValueError, Exception, KeyError, SnappyError, ConnectionError],
    tags: [TimeEffect, ReadIOEffect, WriteIOEffect, RootEffect], forbids: [].}
Subscribe to a remote context for network sync. Address format: "host" or "host:port".

proc track[T, O](self: Ed[T, O];

    discardable.}
proc track[T, O](self: Ed[T, O];
                 callback: proc (changes: seq[Change[O]]) {....gcsafe.}): EID {.
    discardable.}
Register a callback to be called when the container changes. Returns an EID that can be used to untrack the callback later.
